definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Demonstrate ability to diagnose and discuss the etiologies of vesicular and bullous skin lesions.
sentences.chinese: 学习诊断及探讨水疱及大疱皮肤病变之病因。

sentences.english: My hands blistered from holding the racket.
sentences.chinese: 我的手因握球拍而起了水疱。

sentences.english: Researchers have long known that whales suffer blisters on their backs.
sentences.chinese: 研究者在很久以前就知道鲸鱼的后背上会起水疱。

sentences.english: Don't break the blisters or you'll get a secondary infection.
sentences.chinese: 不要弄破水疱，以免继发感染。

sentences.english: The sap of this plant blisters the skin.
sentences.chinese: 这种植物的汁液会使皮肤起水疱。

sentences.english: It started with a tiny blister on my mom's toe.
sentences.chinese: 首先是从妈妈脚趾上的一个小水疱开始的。

sentences.english: Vesicles and blebs are formed by the serum gathering beneath the outer layers of the epidermis.
sentences.chinese: 血浆积于表皮的浅层之下形成水疱和大疱。

sentences.english: Blisters form, rupture, then crust over before healing
sentences.chinese: 然后出现水疱，水疱会破裂，结痂。

sentences.english: Blisters form, rupture, then crust over before healing
sentences.chinese: 然后出现水疱，水疱会破裂，结痂。

sentences.english: Blisters were raised on her feet.
He broke the blister with a needle.
The blister broke when she pricked it.
The last stage of the disease is marked by the appearance of blisters on the skin.
sentences.chinese: 这种疾病最后阶段的特征是皮肤上出现水疱。
